title: Campoal
description: A fully functional full-stack fundraising platform built with React, MongoDB, Supabase, and Bootstrap. It allows users to create and manage fundraising campaigns, track donations, and engage with supporters.

title: ETA Group
description: This is ETA group for interior design, Furniture, and Decor web app.Seamless Design with blazing fast performance, this app reach the score of 92% in performance.

title: Furniture
description: A multi-page E-Commerce furniture store with various features like a search bar, sort options, add to cart, remove from cart, add quantity, or decrease it inside the cart, blog page, and more.

title: Movies Box
description: A fully functional movie and tv shows app that allows users to search for movies and tv shows, view details, and manage their watch-list. It features a user-friendly interface and integrates with a movie database API.

title: Memory Card Game
description: A Memory Card Game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The game challenges players to match pairs of cards while keeping track of their moves and time taken.
